data_table.description: Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HPCAFLAG
variable.description: 1= if form is present [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCACY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA01
variable.description: I am quick tempered. Q1 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA02
variable.description: I have a fiery temper .Q2 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA03
variable.description: I am a hotheaded person. Q3 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA04
variable.description: I get angry when I am slowed down by other mistakes. Q4 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA05
variable.description: I feel annoyed when I am not given recognition for doing good work. Q5 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA06
variable.description: I fly off the handle. Q6 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA07
variable.description: When I get angry, I say nasty things. Q7 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA08
variable.description: It makes me furious when I am criticized in front of others. Q8 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA09
variable.description: When I get frustrated, I feel like hitting someone. Q9 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA10
variable.description: I feel infuriated when I do a good job and get a poor evaluation. Q10 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: HPCA12
variable.description: Type of administration. Q12 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 2]
